package.name: opensimrt_msgs
package.description: The opensimrt_msgs package. This package has common opensimrt messages used to communicate between different opensimrt nodes. Only opensimrt_core, opensimrt_bridge and osrt_ros are using this currently and we aim to make opensimrt_core non-existant (to use just OpenSimRT as a dependency), so in the end it should be only opensimrt_bridge and osrt_ros to use this. In a more distant future this whole package should be made obsolete by publishing appropriate standart ros messages.
